name: The Darkside Detective
description: Join The Darkside Detective, Francis McQueen, as he investigates the bizarre, the supernatural and those missing cat cases that keep getting dropped on his desk.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
